## ApiNamespaceAria2.pauseAll() method

This method is equal to calling `aria2.pause()` for every active/waiting download. This methods returns `OK`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
pauseAll(): Promise<'OK'>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;'OK'&gt;

string 'OK'
